string-array.name: item_desc
string-array.item: Rib-knit scoop neck. Short sleeves. Old Navy logo graphic across front. Curved hem. Soft-washed, lightweight 100% cotton jersey. Tag-free label inside neck for added comfort.
Rib-knit crew neck. Short sleeves. Logo-graphic at front. Soft 100% cotton jersey. All-over print varies by color.
Rib-knit crew neck. Short sleeves. Graphic across front. Curved hem. Soft-washed, lightweight 100% cotton jersey. Tag-free label inside neck for added comfort.
Rib-knit crew neck. Short sleeves. Graphic across front. Curved hem. Soft-washed, lightweight 100% cotton jersey. Tag-free label inside neck for added comfort.

Online exclusive! Forge an unstoppable family unit, with these SUPER-awesome, SUPER-soft matching graphic tees for the whole crew! Rib-knit crew neck. Short sleeves. Matching family "Super Kid" graphic across front. Soft lightweight jersey. Tag-free label inside neck for added comfort.

Set includes short-sleeve sleep tee and coordinating sleep pants. Rib-knit crew neck. Short sleeves. Sleep pants have elasticized waist, rib-knit cuffs and coordinating prints. Soft, fine-gauge rib-knit cotton. Tag-free label inside neck for added comfort.

Sleep set includes patterned sleep tee and matching sleep leggings. Sleep tee has rib-knit crew neck, short sleeves, and all-over dinosaur and "Roar" pattern. Sleep leggings have elasticized waist, rib-knit cuffs, and all-over coordinating pattern. Soft, rib-knit cotton. Tag-free labels inside neck and back waist for added comfort.

This printed pajama set is totally adorable & unisex, too. Wearable & shareable for toddler boys & toddler girls. Two-piece set includes printed long-sleeve sleep tee and matching printed sleep pants. Rib-knit crew neck and long-sleeve cuffs. Matching sleep pants have elasticized waistband and rib-knit cuffs. All-over print features letters of the alphabet. Soft-washed, fine-gauge rib-knit cotton.

This pajama set is totally cute & unisex, too! Wearable & shareable for toddler girl & toddler boy. Set includes sleep tee and matching sleep shorts. Rib-knit crew neck. Short sleeves. Sleep shorts have elasticized waist and all-over coordinating print. Soft, fine-gauge rib-knit cotton.

This pajama set is totally classic and unisex, too. Wearable & shareable for toddler boy & toddler girl. Sleep set includes patterned sleep tee and matching sleep leggings. Sleep tee has rib-knit crew neck, short sleeves, and all-over dinosaur and camo pattern. Sleep leggings have elasticized waist, rib-knit cuffs, and all-over dinosaur and camo pattern. Soft-washed, rib-knit cotton. Tag-free labels inside neck and back waist for added comfort.

Online exclusive! Pack includes 2 sleeveless rompers, each in a different color or print. Elasticized neckline. Spaghetti straps. Cinched, elasticized waist. Snaps along inseam for easy dressing and changing, through size 2T. Soft cotton jersey.

Online exclusive! Pack includes 2 flutter sleeve dresses, each in a different print or pattern. Square neck and seamed front yoke. Soft-washed, woven cotton/rayon blend. Ruffled flutter sleeves. Relaxed swing silhouette.

Rounded neckline. Wide shoulder straps. Cinched, elasticized waist, with decorative bow-tie at center front. Short legs, with snaps along inseam for easy dressing and changing. Soft-washed cotton jersey.

Online exclusive! Pack includes 2 flutter sleeve dresses, each in a different print or pattern. Square neck and seamed front yoke. Soft-washed, woven cotton/rayon blend. Ruffled flutter sleeves. Relaxed swing silhouette.
Online exclusive! Pack includes 2 dresses, each in a different color or print. Rounded neckline. Short sleeves. Seamed, shirred waist. Soft cotton jersey.

Online exclusive! Pack includes 2 pairs of pull-on shorts for toddler girls, each in a different color, print or pattern. Elasticized waistband, with tie-front. On-seam scoop pockets. Soft-washed, cozy french terry. Easy pull-on style.

Online exclusive! Pack includes 2 pairs of jersey-knit jogger shorts for toddler. Elasticized rib-knit waistband, with functional, adjustable drawstring. Faux fly. Soft-washed, combed jersey knit. Easy pull-on style.
Elasticized waistband. Ruffled hem. Soft-washed cotton chambray. Easy pull-on style.

Interior adjustable waistband expands for a perfect fit. Three-snap closure at fly (one functional; two decorative). Scoop pockets in front; patch pockets in back. Soft cotton-blend denim, with contrast topstitching.
Elasticized pull-on waistband. Soft tulle mesh layers, with smooth taffeta underlayer skirt. Flared A-line silhouette.
